Name: Kheshig
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with a Kheshig Sabre.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: While a friendly CHARACTER Formation is within 3" of this Formation, when that friendly CHARACTER Formation is targeted by an attack, before rolling Saves, roll a d6, on a 2+ this Formation takes 1 Ethereal Damage and the friendly Formation being attacked takes no damage.
